Description: Controls how non-numeric values in calculations are handled.
Substitution value for string results in numeric calculations. This is useful when dealing with exception data (e.g. BadValue) returned from data sources used in a calculation.

Used to determine KPI status change calculation behavior. 'Exceeds Only' = Actual is less than < a low limit or greater than > a high limit. 'Meets or Exceeds' (default) = Actual is less than < or equal to = a low limit or greater than > or equal to = a high limit.
